title: AlojaAQP – University Housing Platform
description: Fullstack platform for searching and managing university housing in Arequipa.
fullDescription: AlojaAQP is a web platform designed to help university students find housing near universities in Arequipa. The system lets users filter by price, amenities, location, and availability, providing a clear, user-focused experience.

The project includes a modern frontend built with Vue 3 and a robust backend using Django REST Framework. It implements JWT authentication, role management (students and owners), reviews, favorites, cloud image uploads, and automatic API documentation.

title: aqpTracker
description: Public transportation route management and citizen incident reporting system in Arequipa.
fullDescription: aqpTracker is a civic web platform that allows citizens to search public transport routes, visualize them on interactive maps, and report urban incidents in real time.
The platform combines a modern frontend with a Django REST backend, supporting route visualization, incident reporting with images and geolocation, nested comments, reactions, and notifications.
My main contribution focused on the forum and incident management module, including data modeling, REST APIs, nested comments, reactions, notifications, and image handling.

title: EduTec Academy – Digital Education Platform
description: Web education platform for comprehensive management of courses, students, and teachers with differentiated roles.
fullDescription: EduTec Academy is a modern education platform designed to digitize academic management for educational institutions. It provides clearly defined roles for admins, teachers, and students, each with tailored interfaces and features.

The system includes modular course management, assignments and assessments, visual schedules, interactive dashboards, and secure JWT authentication. The frontend was built with Vue 3 and Vuetify, and the backend uses Django REST Framework.

title: Museum34 – Immersive Virtual Museum
description: Immersive web experience built with WebVR technologies for cultural and educational outreach in Arequipa.
fullDescription: Museum34 is an immersive web platform that lets users explore virtual exhibitions and 3D models showcasing Arequipa’s cultural heritage, accessible from the browser and compatible with VR devices.

The project integrates interactive virtual environments built with A-Frame and Three.js, combined with a modern web interface that enables navigation, exploration, and manipulation of museum elements.
I actively contributed to the frontend implementation, building interaction components, user flows, and visual layers that connect the VR experience with the traditional web interface.
responsibilities: Colaboración activa en la implementación del frontend del proyecto
Desarrollo de componentes de interfaz para la interacción con objetos 3D
Construcción de modales y flujos de interacción entre la UI y el entorno virtual
Integración visual entre la experiencia VR y la navegación web tradicional
Soporte en pruebas de interacción y ajustes de experiencia de usuario

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Fullstack e-commerce platform with REST API architecture, online payments, and complete order management.
fullDescription: This e-commerce platform provides an end-to-end solution for managing products, users, orders, and payments, built with a client-server architecture and a clear separation between frontend and backend.
The system implements secure JWT authentication, a persistent shopping cart, address management, order history, and an admin panel for managing products, users, and orders.

I actively contributed to payment system integration, adjustments to the relational data model, and implementation/refinement of key frontend components, including payment flows, validations, and API communication, ensuring a consistent user experience and overall system stability.

title: AQPTransporte – Interprovincial Ticket Sales Platform
description: Web application for interprovincial ticket sales, with online payments, automatic voucher generation, and an end-to-end purchase experience.
fullDescription: AQPTransporte is a web application designed to cover the entire process of purchasing interprovincial tickets—from route search to travel confirmation—maintaining a smooth, consistent experience at every stage.

The platform integrates online payments via Mercado Pago, automatic voucher generation in PDF, and email delivery, allowing the purchase flow to be completed without external dependencies or manual steps.
Development focused on solid frontend-backend communication, proper payment flow implementation, building key UI components, and handling states, validations, and receipts for the end user.

title: Beverages App – Cocktail Finder
description: Vue.js web application for searching alcoholic beverages, with detailed views and a persistent favorites system.
fullDescription: Beverages App is a lightweight web application focused on browsing alcoholic beverages through a clear, dynamic interface, enabling users to explore different options quickly and easily.
The app consumes a public API to retrieve detailed information for each drink, displaying ingredients, preparation, and presentation via reusable components and interactive modals.
It also includes a favorites system managed with Pinia, allowing selected drinks to be stored and preserving user state during navigation for a smooth, coherent experience.
